import React from "react"; import $ from 'jquery'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import LandingPageAnimation from "../components/landingPageAnimation" import Github from "../assets/images/contact/github.svg" import Linkedin from "../assets/images/contact/linkedin.svg" import Navigation from "../components/navigation" import Goback from "../components/back" const windowHeight = { height: window.innerWidth < 990 ? window.innerHeight * 1.1 : window.innerHeight, minHeight: 600, position: 'relative', } const row = { width: '30%', padding: '24px 24px' } const title = { color: '#585858' } const AboutProject = { margin: 0 } class Contact extends React.Component { state = { background: 0, timeLineHeight: $(document).height() } render() { return (
I deeply care about the human-technology relationship and aim to be part of the entity to define it. Careful research, creative experimentation, and consistent induction are at the heart of my design. My approach to questions always starts from answering the Why, then ideating the How, and eventually designing the What.

Here is a selection of my works for you to get to know me:

Product design

SmoothHire

A job plarform designed to attract millennial technical talents.

Vogether

A social media to help people seek immediate attention.

Voice Design system

A design system site helps create user experience

Coding

ML analogy

A simple game with 3D visual to let people experience Machine learning process.

Flocker

A full-stack application helps solo travelers meet new people, based on common interests.

AwareHealth

A GDPR compliant mental well-being platform using React Native, AWS, Cognito, Amplify, Redux.

Passion projects

Thesis

My one year's research project on discovering Human-Technology relationship.

Alwa

My startup venture on helping people to thrive in their lives.
I would be happy to connect

wangxbella0108@gmail.com
); } } export default Contact;
